overview: Now for the first time, Charo brings here sizzling Las Vegas Show to your home.  A cast of over 30 dancers and musicians join Charo in an evening of non-stop entertainment live on stage in the Bally's Grand Room.  Charo displays her full range of talent, that has made her not only a Las Vegas headliner, but an international superstar, and according to Guitar Players Magazine, the best flamenco guitar player in the world.
title: An Evening With Charo!
